content.question: After the switch has been closed for a long time, it is opened at time t = 0. Which of the following graphs best represents the subsequent current ùëñ at point ùëã as a function of time t ?

choices.label: A graph plots i versus t. The graph shows a concave up increasing curve starting from the origin and rising upward.
A graph plots i versus t. The graph shows a line rising from the origin.
A graph plots i versus t. The graph shows a concave down increasing curve rising from the origin.
